title: Pajeon (Pancakes)
text: o 1 tablespoon soy sauce o 1 tablespoon sesame oil

title:
 
Instructions:
text: o Mix flour, water, and beaten egg in a bowl. o Add chopped green onions and seafood (if using). o Heat sesame oil in a pan and pour in batter. o Cook until golden on both sides. o Serve with soy sauce for dipping.

title:
 
Instructions:
text: o Slice baguette and toast until golden. o Rub toasted bread with cut garlic cloves. o Grate tomatoes and spread on bread. o Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with salt. o Serve immediately.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
Ingredients: 
o 1 pound paneer 
o 1/2 cup yogurt 
o 1 tablespoon lemon juice 
o 1 teaspoon cumin 
o 1 teaspoon coriander 
o 1 teaspoon garam masala 
o 1 teaspoon turmeric o 1 teaspoon salt o Skewers

title:
 
Instructions:
text:
o Cut paneer into cubes. o Mix yogurt, lemon juice, cumin, coriander, garam masala, turmeric, and salt in a
bowl. o
Add paneer cubes and marinate for at least 1 hour. o Thread paneer onto skewers. o Grill or broil until golden, turning occasionally. o Serve warm.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
o 4 cups cubed bread 
o 4 tomatoes 
o 1 cucumber 
o 1 small red onion 
o 1/4 cup basil 
o 1/4 cup olive oil 
o 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar 
o 1 teaspoon salt o 1 cucumber o 1/4 cup basil o 1/4 cup olive oil o 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar o 1 teaspoon salt

title:

Instructions:
text:
o Toast bread cubes until golden. o
Dice tomatoes and cucumber, slice red onion. o Mix bread, tomatoes, cucumber, onion, and chopped basil. o Whisk olive oil, vinegar, and salt, then pour over salad. o
Toss well and serve.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text: o 1 cup urad dal flour o 1/4 cup water o 1/2 teaspoon salt o Oil for frying

title:
 
Instructions:
text: o Mix urad dal flour, water, and salt to form a dough. o Roll dough into thin circles. o Fry in hot oil until crispy. o Drain on paper towels and serve.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
 
Ingredients: o 4 potatoes o 1/4 cup olive oil o 1/2 cup tomato sauce o 1 teaspoon paprika o 1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper o 1/2 teaspoon salt o 1/4 cup mayonnaise

title:
 
Instructions:
text: o Peel and dice potatoes. o Toss potatoes with olive oil and salt, then roast at 400°F (200°C) until crispy. o Mix tomato sauce, paprika, and cayenne pepper in a bowl. o Serve potatoes with tomato sauce and a dollop of mayonnaise.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
o 1 pound beef 
o 1 small onion 
o 2 cloves garlic 
o 4 cups beef broth 
o 1 cup spinach 
o 1 cup okra 
o 1 teaspoon thyme 
o 1 teaspoon salt 
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper o 1 teaspoon salt o 1/2 teaspoon pepper

title:

Instructions:
text: o Sauté diced beef, onion, and minced garlic until browned. o Add beef broth, thyme, salt, and pepper, simmer for 1 hour. o Stir in spinach and okra, cook until tender. o Serve warm.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text: o 1 pound chicken thighs o 1/4 cup peri-peri sauce o 2 tablespoons olive oil o 1 teaspoon salt o 1/2 teaspoon pepper

title:
 
Instructions:
text:
o Marinate chicken in peri-peri sauce, olive oil, salt, and pepper for at least 1 hour.
o Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). o Arrange chicken on a baking sheet and roast for 25-30 minutes until cooked
through. o Serve warm.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
o 4 tomatoes 
o 1 small onion 
o 1 jalapeño 
o 1/4 cup cilantro
o 1 lime 
o 1 teaspoon salt o 1 lime o 1 teaspoon salt

title:

Instructions:
text: o Dice tomatoes, onion, and jalapeño. o Chop cilantro. o Combine all ingredients in a bowl. o Squeeze lime juice over the mixture and add salt. o Mix well and serve.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
 
Ingredients: o 1 pound Padrón peppers o 2 tablespoons olive oil o
1 teaspoon sea salt

title:

Instructions:
text: o Heat olive oil in a pan. o Add Padrón peppers and sauté until blistered and tender. o Sprinkle with sea salt and serve warm.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text: o 2 green plantains o 1 cup vegetable oil o 1 teaspoon salt

title:
 
Instructions:
text: o Peel and slice plantains thinly. o Heat oil in a pan and fry plantain slices until crispy. o Drain on paper towels and sprinkle with salt. o Serve warm.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
o 1 cup cornmeal 
o 4 cups water 
o 1 teaspoon salt 
o 2 tablespoons butter 
o 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese o 4 cups water o 1 teaspoon salt o 2 tablespoons butter o 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese

title:

Instructions:
text: o Bring water and salt to a boil. o Gradually whisk in cornmeal. o Reduce heat and cook, stirring constantly, until thickened (about 30 minutes). o Stir in butter and Parmesan cheese. o Serve warm.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
Ingredients: 
o 4 potatoes 
o 2 eggs 
o 1 small onion 
o 1/2 cup mayonnaise 
o 2 tablespoons mustard
o 1 tablespoon vinegar 
o 1 teaspoon salt 
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper o 1/2 cup mayonnaise o 2 tablespoons mustard o 1 tablespoon vinegar o 1 teaspoon salt o 1/2 teaspoon pepper

title:
 
Instructions:
text:
o Boil potatoes until tender, then dice. o Hard-boil eggs, then chop. o Mix potatoes, eggs, diced onion, mayonnaise, mustard, vinegar, salt, and pepper. o Mix potatoes, eggs, diced onion, mayonnaise, mustard, vinegar, salt, and pepper.
o Chill for at least 1 hour before serving. o Chill for at least 1 hour before serving.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
o 2 1/4 teaspoons active dry yeast 
o 1 teaspoon sugar 
o 1 cup warm water 
o 3 cups flour 
o 1 teaspoon salt 
o 1/4 cup baking soda 
o 1 egg 
o
Coarse salt

title:
 
Instructions:
text: o Dissolve yeast and sugar in warm water, let sit until foamy. o Mix flour and salt in a bowl, then add yeast mixture. o Knead until smooth, then let rise until doubled. o Divide dough into pieces and roll into ropes, then shape into pretzels. o Boil water with baking soda and dip pretzels in the solution. o Place on a baking sheet, brush with beaten egg, and sprinkle with coarse salt. o Bake at 450°F (230°C) for 12-15 minutes until golden. o Serve warm.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
o 1 cup basmati rice
o 2 cups water 
o 1 small onion o 1 carrot 
o 1/2 cup peas 
o 1 teaspoon cumin 
o 1 teaspoon coriander 
o 1 teaspoon turmeric 
o 1 teaspoon garam masala 
o 1 teaspoon salt 
o 2 tablespoons oil o 1 teaspoon coriander o 1 teaspoon turmeric o 1 teaspoon garam masala o 1 teaspoon salt o 2 tablespoons oil

title:
 
Instructions:
text:
o
Rinse rice and soak in water for 30 minutes. o Heat oil in a pan and sauté diced onion until translucent. o Add diced carrot, peas, cumin, coriander, turmeric, and garam masala, cook for 1
minute. o Drain rice and add to the pan, stir to coat with spices. o Add water and bring to a boil. o Reduce heat, cover, and simmer until rice is tender and water is absorbed. o Add salt to taste and serve.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
o
4 flour tortillas o
2 cups shredded cheese o 1/2 cup diced cooked chicken (optional) o 1/4 cup chopped cilantro o 1 tablespoon vegetable oil

title:
 
Instructions:
text:
o Heat oil in a pan. o Place a tortilla in the pan and sprinkle with cheese, chicken, and cilantro. o Top with another tortilla. o Cook until cheese is melted and tortilla is golden, then flip and cook the other
side. o Cut into wedges and serve.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
g
o 1 pie crust 
o 6 slices bacon 
o 1 small onion 
o 1 cup grated Gruyère cheese 
o 3 eggs 
o 1 cup heavy cream 
o 1/2 teaspoon salt 
o 1/4 teaspoon pepper i

title:

Instructions:
text:
o Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). o Cook bacon until crispy, then crumble. o Sauté diced onion in bacon fat until softened. o Place pie crust in a pie dish and sprinkle with bacon, onion, and cheese. o Beat eggs with cream, salt, and pepper, then pour over the filling. o Bake for 30-35 minutes until set and golden. o
Serve warm.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text: o 1 cup coconut o 1/4 cup butter o 10 egg yolks o 1 teaspoon vanilla extract

title:

Instructions:
text:
o Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). o Mix sugar, coconut, melted butter, egg yolks, and vanilla extract in a bowl. o Pour mixture into greased muffin tins. o Bake for 30-35 minutes until set and golden. o Let cool before removing from tins. o
Serve chilled.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
o 1 cup yogurt 
o 1/2 cucumber 
o 1/4 cup mint 
o 1/4 teaspoon cumin
o 1/4 teaspoon salt o 1/4 cup mint o 1/4 teaspoon cumin o 1/4 teaspoon salt

title:
 
Instructions:
text: o Grate cucumber and squeeze out excess moisture. o Mix yogurt with cucumber, chopped mint, cumin, and salt. o Serve chilled.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
o 1 eggplant 
o 1 zucchini 
o 1 bell pepper 
o 1 small onion 
o 2 cloves garlic 
o 4 tomatoes 
o 1 teaspoon thyme o 1 teaspoon rosemary o 1/4 cup olive oil o 1 teaspoon salt

title:

Instructions:
text: o Dice eggplant, zucchini, bell pepper, and tomatoes. o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic in olive oil until softened. o Add eggplant, zucchini, bell pepper, tomatoes, thyme, rosemary, and salt. o Simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. o Serve warm.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text: o 1 pound morning glory o 4 cloves garlic o 2 tablespoons fish sauce o 1 tablespoon vegetable oil

title:
 
Instructions:
text:
o Sauté minced garlic in vegetable oil until fragrant. o Add morning glory and stir-fry until tender. o Add fish sauce and cook for 2 minutes. o
Serve warm.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text: o 2 cups cooked pinto beans o 1/4 cup lard or vegetable oil o 1 small onion o 1 clove garlic o 1 teaspoon salt

title:

Instructions:
text:
o Heat lard or oil in a pan and sauté diced onion and minced garlic until
translucent. o Add beans and mash with a potato masher. o Cook, stirring frequently, until beans are thickened. o Add salt to taste and serve.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
o 1 pound chicken 
o 1 small onion 
o 2 cloves garlic 
o 1 teaspoon cumin 
o 1 teaspoon turmeric
o 1 teaspoon ginger o 1 teaspoon ginger o 1 teaspoon salt o 1/4 cup olive oil o 4 cups chicken broth o 1/4 cup lentils o 1/4 cup cilantro o 4 pieces flatbread

title:

Instructions:
text:
o Sauté chicken, diced onion, and minced garlic in olive oil until browned. o Add cumin, turmeric, ginger, and salt, cook for 1 minute. o Add chicken broth and lentils, simmer until chicken is cooked and lentils are
tender. o Stir in chopped cilantro. o Tear flatbread into pieces and place in a serving dish. o Pour chicken and sauce over the bread and serve warm.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text: o 1 cup rice o 1 cup coconut milk o 1 cup water o 1/2 cup kidney beans o 1 small onion o 2 cloves garlic o 1 teaspoon thyme o 1 teaspoon salt

title:
 
Instructions:
text: o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic until softened. o Add rice, coconut milk, water, kidney beans, thyme, and salt. o Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer until rice is tender. o Serve warm.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text: o 1 pound pork shoulder o 1/2 cup duck fat o 1/4 cup white wine o 1 teaspoon thyme o 1 teaspoon salt o 1/2 teaspoon pepper

title:
 
Instructions:
text:
o Cut pork into small pieces. o Cook pork with duck fat, wine, thyme, salt, and pepper in a pot over low heat
until very tender (about 3 hours). o Shred pork with a fork and pack into jars. o Chill until set. 
o Serve with bread.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
o 1 cup Arborio rice 
o 4 cups chicken broth 
o 1/2 cup white wine 
o 1 small onion 
o 2 cloves garlic 
o 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese
o 2 tablespoons butter 
o 1 tablespoon olive oil

title:
 
Instructions:
text:
o Heat broth in a pot and keep warm. o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic in olive oil until translucent. o Add rice and cook until lightly toasted. o
Pour in wine and cook until absorbed. o Add broth one ladle at a time, stirring constantly until absorbed. o Continue until rice is creamy and tender. o Stir in butter and grated Parmesan cheese. o Serve immediately.

title: Rösti (Potato Pancakes)
text:
 
Ingredients: 
o 4 potatoes 
o 1 small onion 
o 1/4 cup flour 
o 1 egg 
o 1 teaspoon salt 
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper 
o Oil for frying i

title:

Instructions:
text: o Grate potatoes and onion, then squeeze out excess moisture. o Mix with flour, beaten egg, salt, and pepper. o Form mixture into patties. o Fry in hot oil until golden on both sides. o Drain on paper towels and serve warm.

title: Rotkohl (Braised Red Cabbage)
text:
o 1 head red cabbage o 1/4 cup vinegar 
o 1/4 cup sugar 
o 1/4 cup water 
o 1 teaspoon salt 
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper o 1/4 cup vinegar o 1/4 cup water o 1 teaspoon salt o 1/2 teaspoon pepper

title:
 
Instructions:
text: o Shred cabbage and slice onion and apple. o Sauté onion in a pot until softened. o Add cabbage, apple, vinegar, sugar, water, salt, and pepper. o Simmer for 45 minutes until cabbage is tender. o Serve warm.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
o 1/2 pound kefalotyri cheese o 1/4 cup flour o 1/4 cup olive oil o
1 lemon

title:

Instructions:
text: o Cut cheese into slices. o Dredge cheese in flour. o Heat olive oil in a pan and fry cheese until golden on both sides. o Squeeze lemon juice over the top and serve immediately.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text: o 1/4 cup green beans o 1 can tuna o 1/4 cup olive oil o 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar o 1 teaspoon Dijon mustard o 1 teaspoon salt

title:

Instructions:
text: o Dice tomatoes and cucumber, slice red onion. o Blanch green beans until tender. o Arrange tomatoes, cucumber, onion, green beans, olives, and tuna on a plate. o Quarter hard-boiled eggs and add to the salad. o Whisk olive oil, vinegar, mustard, and salt, then drizzle over the salad. o Toss gently and serve.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
Ingredients: 
o 2 cups shredded chicken
o 1 small onion 
o 1 carrot 
o 1 apple 
o 1/4 cup raisins 
o 1/4 cup mayonnaise 
o 1/4 cup parsley 
o 1 teaspoon salt

title:
 
Instructions:
text:
o Dice onion, grate carrot, and chop apple. o Mix shredded chicken with onion, carrot, apple, raisins, mayonnaise, chopped
parsley, and salt.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
o 1 pound salted cod
o 1 small onion 
o 2 cloves garlic 
o 1/2 cup flour 
o 1/4 cup water 
o 1 teaspoon thyme 
o 1 teaspoon salt 
o Oil for frying

title:
 
Instructions:
text: o Soak salted cod in water overnight, then rinse and flake. o Mix cod with diced onion, minced garlic, flour, water, thyme, and salt. o Form mixture into fritters. o Fry in hot oil until golden. o Drain on paper towels and serve warm.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
o 2 cups flour 
o 1/4 cup oil 
o 1/2 cup water 
o 2 potatoes 
o 1/2 cup peas 
o 1 small onion 
o 1 teaspoon cumin 
o 1 teaspoon coriander o 1 teaspoon garam masala o 1 teaspoon salt o Oil for frying

title:

Instructions:
text: o Mix flour, oil, and water to form a dough, then let rest. o Boil and mash potatoes, then mix with peas, diced onion, and spices. o Roll dough into circles, cut in half, and form cones. o Fill cones with potato mixture and seal edges. o Fry in hot oil until golden. o Serve warm.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text: o 1 pound chicken breast o 1/4 cup coconut milk o 2 tablespoons soy sauce o 2 tablespoons peanut butter o 1 tablespoon curry powder o 1 tablespoon brown sugar o Skewers

title:

Instructions:
text:
o Cut chicken into strips and thread onto skewers. o Mix coconut milk, soy sauce, peanut butter, curry powder, and brown sugar in a
bowl. o Marinate chicken in the mixture for at least 1 hour. o Grill or broil until cooked through. o Serve with peanut sauce.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text: o 1 head cabbage o 1 tablespoon sea salt o 1 teaspoon caraway seeds

title:
 
Instructions:
text: o Shred cabbage and mix with sea salt and caraway seeds. o Pack cabbage into a jar and press down to release juices. o Cover and let ferment at room temperature for 1-2 weeks. o Store in the refrigerator and serve as needed.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
o 1 small onion 
o 2 cloves garlic
o 1 bell pepper o 1 small onion o 2 cloves garlic o 1 bell pepper o
4 tomatoes o 1 teaspoon cumin o 1 teaspoon paprika o 1 teaspoon salt o 4 eggs o 1/4 cup parsley

title:

Instructions:
text: o Sauté diced onion, minced garlic, and diced bell pepper until softened. o Add diced tomatoes, cumin, paprika, and salt, simmer for 10 minutes. o Make wells in the sauce and crack eggs into each well. o Make wells in the sauce and crack eggs into each well. o Cover and cook until eggs are set. o Garnish with chopped parsley and serve.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text: o 1 pound chicken thighs o 1/4 cup yogurt o 2 tablespoons lemon juice o 2 cloves garlic o 1 teaspoon cumin o 1 teaspoon paprika o 1 teaspoon turmeric o 1 teaspoon salt o 1/2 teaspoon pepper

title:

Instructions:
text:
o Mix yogurt, lemon juice, minced garlic, cumin, paprika, turmeric, salt, and pepper
in a bowl. o Marinate chicken in the mixture for at least 2 hours. o Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). o Arrange chicken on a baking sheet and roast for 25-30 minutes until cooked
through. o Slice and serve with pita bread and toppings.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
o 4 potatoes 
o 4 cloves garlic 
o 1/4 cup olive oil 
o 1/4 cup lemon juice 
o 1 teaspoon salt o 4 potatoes o 4 cloves garlic o 1/4 cup olive oil o 1/4 cup lemon juice o 1 teaspoon salt

title:

Instructions:
text:
o Boil potatoes until tender, then mash. o Blend mashed potatoes with minced garlic, olive oil, lemon juice, and salt until
smooth. o Serve as a dip or side dish.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
g
o 1 green papaya 
o 2 tomatoes 
o 1 carrot 
o 2 cloves garlic 
o 2 tablespoons fish sauce
o 2 tablespoons lime juice 
o 1 tablespoon sugar 
o 1 tablespoon peanuts 
o 1-2 Thai chilies

title:
 
Instructions:
text: o Peel and shred green papaya and carrot. o Crush garlic and chilies in a mortar and pestle. o Add fish sauce, lime juice, and sugar, mix well. o Toss shredded papaya, carrot, and sliced tomatoes with the dressing. o Garnish with crushed peanuts and serve.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
g
o 4 corn tortillas 
o 1 tablespoon vegetable oil 
o 1 small onion 
o 2 cloves garlic 
o 4 cups chicken broth 
o 2 tomatoes 
o 1 teaspoon cumin 
o 1 avocado 
o 1/4 cup cilantro

title:
 
Instructions:
text: o Cut tortillas into strips and fry in oil until crispy. o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic in a pot until translucent. o Add diced tomatoes and cumin, cook for 5 minutes. o Pour in chicken broth and bring to a boil. o Simmer for 10 minutes. o Serve soup topped with tortilla strips, diced avocado, and chopped cilantro.
